alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 09 at 8:46PM PDT until September 09 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...the Antelope Valley, the Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range, and the Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...Through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moisture from Kay will linger through Saturday evening. Showers and thunderstorms with periods of heavy rain at times will increase the risk of flooding, especially in the mountains. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
